mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_TB( USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, USER_BRITH, USER_ADDRESS, USER_SEX, USER_NICK) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{brith}, #{address}, #{sex}, #{nick} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, USER_BRITH, USER_ADDRESS, USER_GRADE, USER_MONEY, USER_SEX, USER_NICK, USER_SIGNDATE, USER_ROLE, USER_STATE, USER_TEL FROM USER_TB WHERE USER_ID = #{user_name} AND USER_PASSWORD = #{user_pw}
